content: Immobilize can drastically help when fighting a Falcon Hermit, and always keep your eyes peeled for wind-based attacks. These can easily blend in with the snowy surroundings of the mountain.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Falcon_Hermit_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Falcon Hermit Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Falcon Hermit Fight Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Immobilize can drastically help when fighting a Falcon Hermit, and always keep your eyes peeled for wind-based attacks. These can easily blend in with the snowy surroundings of the mountain.
